alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 14 at 10:26PM PST until December 15 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile at times in dense freezing fog. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential icy conditions on bridges and roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense freezing fog will be most widespread from the Tri-Cities northward, especially near Hanford.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
